transcripts.text: They made a movie called The American Gospel about me.
Once again, it's not about you, Todd.
None of them called me to talk to me.  Not one of them asked me to share my heart.
Not one of them asked me what I believe.  Todd is not telling the truth.  Brandon Kimber tried to interview Todd White for The American Gospel movie, but Todd refused.
They assumed and put me into a place of guilt because of association.

No, Todd, your own false teaching and fake healing that is documented in your own videos is the problem.  Look at the leg on our left.  That's where all the action is.  That's what's actually being manipulated.

I had torn my knee and I didn't get healed and I had people pray for me and my knee did not get healed and I had a torn meniscus and went through surgery and came out of surgery and was hurting really bad in my knee.

I tore my knee one time and I'm like, man, I don't like this.  I'm a guy that's praying for the sick all the time.  So God says to me, or I kneel on the floor and I'm like, I just want to kneel down.  I'm trying to squeeze my knee and I hear this voice, this still small voice, just go ahead.  And I kneel and bent the whole way and my knee was completely healed.  It was ridiculous, man.  So amazing.  And I received it straight from my father.
And my knee did not get healed.
And my knee was completely healed.
And Jesus was tempted at all points.  That scripture alone verifies that when he was here, he walked this out as a man.  See, if Jesus didn't do what he did as a man, there's nothing for us to model.
But it makes sense that you want to use the guilt by association tactic since your friends are false teachers too.
And friends like Bill Johnson or Kenneth Copeland don't know how that works.
I've just for years and years since I've been saved, I've just looked at the rock solid ministry of Kenneth Copeland.
You don't have a God in you.  You are one.  Or Kenneth Copeland.  Now all of a sudden Todd's the biggest heretic on the planet or Benny Hinn.

Shame on you for not praying for me and talking to me but making a movie thinking that you're God's police.  You're gonna stand before a holy God and answer for your life of judgment and hate.  and it's called murder.
It's no different than racism.  It's the same thing.  Great.  I didn't pray that!  Thank you.
